title: Vaa Deal Lyrics Vaa Deal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Vaa Deal Song LyricsÂ 
Singer(s): Suchith Suresan, Sooraj Santhosh, Senthildass, Sam. P, Keerthan
& Megha

vedi vedi
idhu saravedi saravedi
kodi kodi
ini parakkattum jayakkodi
podi podi
ada edhirigal podi podi
erimalai kumuralai
panithuli adakkumaa.

Adi adi
ivan adigalum idi idi
pidi pidi
ada udumbena ivan pidi
mudi mudi
ivan sirasinil madhimudi
narigalin thandhiram
ivanidam palikkumaa.

modhi paarudaa modhi paaru
vettri veludaa vettri veludaa
modhi paaruda moonji udayum
dhillirundhaa deal-e thaan
power aana aaludaa
evan vandhu ivan munna
ninnu paarthaa deal-u da

vedi vedi
idhu saravedi saravedi
kodi kodi
ini parakkattum jayakkodi
podi podi
ada edhirigal podi podi
erimalai kumuralai
panithuli adakkumaa.

Thanni vaththi pona kadal
boomiyila illada
thati kaetta vetkapatta
aamvalaye illada

Neram kaalam ellaam
paarthu thittamitta
podhumey.
Neththiliyidam maattikkitta
thimingalam thorkkumey.

Kolai vazhkaye palakkamilla
kooru podura veera pulla

Suththi vitta pambaram
pola kaalu suththidum.
kaththi kambu aruvaalum
kalangidum deal-u da.

Arjunaru amba pola
thavaraama thaakkuven.
ettu dhisai thirumbida
yaedhedho pannuven.

Kaththi sanda puththi sanda
rendulayum ...
kombanukku komban kooda
vambiluthaa gaalida..

konjam kooda illa bayamthaam
yedhayum saachidum
yaana balamthaan.

Kaiyya kaala kattavum
vaazha otta vettavum.
vittha ellaam kattravan.
eppayumey jeyuppendaa.

vedi vedi
idhu saravedi saravedi
kodi kodi
ini parakkattum jayakkodi
podi podi
ada edhirigal podi podi
erimalai kumuralai
panithuli adakkumaa.
